QuestData.Title: The Perfect Offering
QuestData.Description:
Dis offering is all dat I have to my name, but it wouldn't be right for me to use it for myself when I know your friend is in danger.
She saved my life, now I can save hers.
Take de offering. Don't make me ask twice.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the offering to Akunda the Exalted at the Temple of Akunda.
